title: Colombo – Galle Road blocked by Panadura Protest
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A protest in Panadura has completely obstructed the Colombo – Galle Main Road.
The protest was launched by the people against the fuel price hike and the shortage of fuel supplies.
People are still blocking the Galle Road, Panadura-Horana Road, and several by roads from the center of the Panadura town.
News 1st Correspondents noted that due to this traffic movement have come to a complete standstill.
#Rambukkana Shooting : Curfew in effect; Police, STF deployed to maintain order
